Articles.Description: The actor has been basking in accolades at the Cannes Film Festival, where his new movie Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny had its world premiere
Articles.Content:
Harrison Ford is still "hot" at 80!
At a photo call and press conference for his new movie Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny at the Cannes Film Festival on Friday, the star posed with his honora… [+1742 chars]

Articles.Title: Javier Bardem Says He Did ‘Nothing’ In Iconic ‘No Country’ Scene, Heaps Praise On Scene Partner
